info.title: INF O2 Services API
info.description: Swagger OpenAPI document for the INF O2 Services

uriPrefix.description: Specifies the URI prefix for the API

apiVersions.description: Version(s) supported for the API signaled by the uriPrefix attribute.

uriPrefix.description: Specifies the URI prefix for the API

apiVersions.description: Version(s) supported for the API signaled by the uriPrefix attribute.

globalCloudId.description: Identifier of the O-Cloud instance. Globally unique across O-Cloud instances.

globalcloudId.description: Identifier of the O-Cloud instance. Globally unique across O-Cloud instances.(Specification)

name.description: Human readable name of the O-Cloud.

description.description: Human readable description of the O-Cloud.

serviceUri.description: The fully qualified URI root to all services provided by the O2ims interface

extensions.description: These are unspecified (not standardized) properties (keys) which are tailored by the vendor to extend the information provided about the O-Cloud.

name.description: Human readable name of the resource type.

description.description: Human readable description of the resource type.

model.description: Information about the model of the resource as defined by its provider.

version.description: Version or generation of the resource as defined by its provider.

extensions.description: List of metadata key-value pairs used to associate meaningful metadata to the related resource type.

alarmDictionarySchemaVersion.description: Version of the Alarm Dictionary Schema to which this alarm dictionary conforms.

entityType.description: O-RAN entity type emitting the alarm: This shall be unique per vendor ResourceType.model and ResourceType.version

vendor.description: Vendor of the Entity Type to whom this Alarm Dictionary applies. This should be the same value as in the ResourceType.vendor attribute.

managementInterfaceId.description: List of management interface over which alarms are transmitted for this Entity Type.

pkNotificationField.description: Identifies which field or list of fields in the alarm notification contains the primary key (PK) into the Alarm Dictionary for this interface; i.e. which field contains the Alarm Definition ID.

alarmDefinition.description: Contains the list of alarms that can be detected against this ResourceType.

alarmDefinitionId.description: Provides a unique identifier of the alarm being raised.

alarmName.description: Provides short name for the alarm.

alarmLastChange.description: Indicates the Alarm Dictionary Version in which this alarm last changed.

alarmChangeType.description: Indicates the type of change that occurred during the alarm last change; added, deleted, modified.

alarmDescription.description: Provides a longer descriptive meaning of the alarm condition and a description of the consequences of the alarm condition.
alarmDescription.example:
host=<hostname>.filesystem=<mount-dir>
    File System threshold exceeded; threshold x%, actual y% .
        CRITICAL @ 90%
        MAJOR    @ 80%
OR
host=<hostname>.volumegroup=<volumegroup-name>
    Monitor and if condition persists, consider addin ...

proposedRepairActions.description: Provides guidance for proposed repair actions.

clearingType.description: Identifies whether alarm is cleared automatically or manually.

managementInterfaceId.description: List of management interface over which alarms are transmitted for this Entity Type.

pkNotificationField.description: Identifies which field or list of fields in the alarm notification contains the primary key (PK) into the Alarm Dictionary for this interface; i.e. which field contains the Alarm Definition ID.

alarmAdditionalFields.description: List of metadata key-value pairs used to associate meaningful metadata to the related resource type.

resourcePoolId.description: Identifier for the Resource Pool in the O-Cloud instance.

globalLocationId.description: This identifier is copied from the O-Cloud Id assigned by the SMO during the O-Cloud deployment.

name.description: Human readable name of the resource pool.

description.description: Human readable description of the resource pool.

location.description: Information about the geographical location of the resource pool as detected by the O-Cloud.

extensions.description: List of metadata key-value pairs used to associate meaningful metadata to the related resource pool.

resourceTypeId.description: Identifier for the Resource Type of this resource.

resourcePoolId.description: Identifier of the Resource Pool containing this resource.

globalAssetId.description: Identifier or serial number of the resource.

description.description: Human readable description of the resource.

resourcePoolId.description: Identifier of the Resource Pool containing this resource.

globalAssetId.description: Identifier or serial number of the resource.

name.description: Human readable name of the deployment manager.

description.description: Human readable description of the deployment manager.

serviceUri.description: The fully qualified URI to a Deployment Management server for O2dms.

profileSupportList.description: Profile support list, use default for the return endpoint

extensions.description: List of metadata key-value pairs used to associate meaningful metadata to the related Deployment Manager

OS.description: Show the OS capablities of the Deployment Manager

cpu.description: Show the cpu capacity of the Deployment Manager

hugepages-2Mi.description: Show the 2Mi hugepages capacity of the Deployment Manager

hugepages-1Gi.description: Show the 1Gi hugepages capacity of the Deployment Manager

name.description: Human readable name of the deployment manager.

description.description: Human readable description of the deployment manager.

serviceUri.description: The fully qualified URI to a Deployment Management server for O2dms.

helmcli_host_with_port.description: Helm CLI Host address with SSH port

consumerSubscriptionId.description: Identifier for the consumer of events sent due to the Subscription.

filter.description: Criteria for events which do not need to be reported or will be filtered by the subscription notification service. Therefore, if a filter is not provided then all events are reported.

callback.description: The fully qualified URI to a consumer procedure which can process a Post of the InventoryEventNotification.

consumerSubscriptionId.description: Identifier for the consumer of events sent due to the Subscription.

filter.description: Criteria for events which do not need to be reported or will be filtered by the subscription notification service. Therefore, if a filter is not provided then all events are reported.

alarmEventRecordId.description: The identifier for the AlarmEventRecord Object.

resourceTypeId.description: A reference to the type of resource which caused the alarm.

resourceTypeID.description: A reference to the type of resource which caused the alarm.(Specification)

resourceId.description: A reference to the resource instance which caused the alarm.

resourceID.description: A reference to the resource instance which caused the alarm.(Specification)

alarmDefinitionId.description: A reference to the Alarm Definition record in the Alarm Dictionary associated with the referenced Resource Type.

alarmDefinitionID.description: A reference to the Alarm Definition record in the Alarm Dictionary associated with the referenced Resource Type.(Specification)

probableCauseId.description: A reference to the ProbableCause of the Alarm.

probableCauseID.description: A reference to the ProbableCause of the Alarm.(Specification)

alarmRaisedTime.description: Date/Time stamp value when the AlarmEventRecord has been created.

alarmChangedTime.description: Date/Time stamp value when any value of the AlarmEventRecord has been modified.

alarmAcknowledgeTime.description: Date/Time stamp value when the alarm condition is acknowledged.

alarmAcknowledged.description: Boolean value indicating of a management system has acknowledged the alarm.

perceivedSeverity.description:
One of the following values: 
 0 for "CRITICAL" 
1 for "MAJOR" 
2 for "MINOR" 
3 for "WARNING" 
4 for "INDETERMINATE" 
5 for "CLEARED"

alarmAcknowledged.description: Boolean value indication of a management system has acknowledged the alarm.

perceivedSeverity.description: indicate that the alarm record is requested to be cleared. Only the value "5" for "CLEARED" is permitted in a request message content.

MaskError.description: When any error occurs on mask
